roleset.name: allow air circulation, circulate air
roleset.note: VENTILATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. (from ventilate.01-v)
VENTILATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in medpedia-part1-nouns. Comparison to 'ventilate.01'. See VN class other_cos-45.4. No FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from ventilation.01-n)
VENTILATED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from ventilated.01-j)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Workers described `` clouds of blue dust '' that hung over parts of the factory , even though exhaust fans ventilated the area .

example.name: Or a room/area
example.text: Their inadequate ventilation of the lead paint in the room
